DOC.brief_title: Characterization Changes Ventricular Mechanics Response Lexiscan Stress Using Tagged Cine Cardiac Magnetic Resonance Imaging
DOC.criteria: Myocardial rest/regadenoson stress perfusion PET study within 60 day Normal rest LVEF ( great equal 50 % ) No change symptom treatment PET MRI study Willing consent study Male female either postmenopausal , surgically sterile , childbearing potential , negative pregnancy test within 2 day prior MRI study . Renal dysfunction ( estimate glomerular filtration rate < 60 mL/min/1.73m2 ) within 6 month Metallic implant , pacemaker , blood vessel clip ( contraindicate MRI ) Patient size exceeds MRI bore/table limit : ( Max body diameter > 60 cm , weight > 136 kg ) History gadolinium contrast allergy intolerance Second third degree AV block Sinus node dysfunction Acute myocardial infarction ( past 3 month ) Actively wheeze acute asthma bronchospastic attack require change therapy within past 30 day Patients experience previous hypersensitivity reaction think related regadenoson
